content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":86031,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こいつが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So this is...\""},{"lineNumber":86032,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、妖怪王黒部殿だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, it's the Youkai King Kurobe.\""},{"lineNumber":86033,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おめぇ……政宗……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You... Masamune...\""},{"lineNumber":86034,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺はもう妖怪王になる気は","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I already said I don't intend to become the Youkai King,"},{"lineNumber":86035,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ねぇっつったのに、","translatedEnglishLine":" but still,"},{"lineNumber":86036,"originalJapaneseLine":"　またのこのことやってくるたぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":" you come shambling back again...\""},{"lineNumber":86037,"originalJapaneseLine":"「噛み殺されてぇかぁぁああ！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You want to be bitten to death?!\""},{"lineNumber":86038,"originalJapaneseLine":"空気をビリビリと震わせる咆哮が、","translatedEnglishLine":"A roar that made the air crackle and tremble,"},{"lineNumber":86039,"originalJapaneseLine":"音の塊となってランス達に叩きつけられた。","translatedEnglishLine":"became a solid mass of sound and crashed into Rance and the others."},{"lineNumber":86040,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あわわわ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah, wah wah...\""},{"lineNumber":86041,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こら、腰抜かすな、シィル。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, don't lose your nerve, Sheila."},{"lineNumber":86042,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺まで格好悪く見られるだろうが」","translatedEnglishLine":" If you faint, I'll look bad too.\""},{"lineNumber":86043,"originalJapaneseLine":"「黒部殿、貴方がそう言うなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Kurobe, if you say so,"},{"lineNumber":86044,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう妖怪王として","translatedEnglishLine":" then I no longer intend to have you reign"},{"lineNumber":86045,"originalJapaneseLine":"　君臨してもらおうとは思っていない」","translatedEnglishLine":" as the Youkai King.\""},{"lineNumber":86046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh?\""},{"lineNumber":86047,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なら、何用だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, what do you want?\""},{"lineNumber":86048,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今、妖怪は俺と貴方、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Right now, the youkai are split between you and me,"},{"lineNumber":86049,"originalJapaneseLine":"　二分されている」","translatedEnglishLine":" divided in two.\""},{"lineNumber":86050,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、結構じゃねぇか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, that's fine."},{"lineNumber":86051,"originalJapaneseLine":"　妖怪なんだ、好きに生きりゃあいい」","translatedEnglishLine":" They're youkai after all, they should live as they please.\""},{"lineNumber":86052,"originalJapaneseLine":"「というわけにもいかない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But that won't do."},{"lineNumber":86053,"originalJapaneseLine":"　現在JAPANは未曾有の危機にある。","translatedEnglishLine":" Currently, JAPAN is facing an unprecedented crisis."},{"lineNumber":86054,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今は妖怪も人間と手を取り合わねば手遅れになる」","translatedEnglishLine":" Now the youkai must also join hands with humans or it will be too late.\""},{"lineNumber":86055,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……回りくどい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You're beating around the bush.\""},{"lineNumber":86056,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人類の喧嘩だ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A human conflict!?\""},{"lineNumber":86057,"originalJapaneseLine":"　妖怪王の所在だぁ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":" The whereabouts of the Youkai King!?\""},{"lineNumber":86058,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺の知ったことか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why should I care!\""},{"lineNumber":86059,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この妖怪どもは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"These youkai guys"},{"lineNumber":86060,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺に勝手についてきやがった連中よ！」","translatedEnglishLine":" are the ones who came following me on their own!\""},{"lineNumber":86061,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それが気に食わねぇなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you don't like that,"},{"lineNumber":86062,"originalJapaneseLine":"　テメェが男を見せりゃあいい！」","translatedEnglishLine":" then you show you're a man!\""},{"lineNumber":86063,"originalJapaneseLine":"「違うか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Am I wrong!?\""},{"lineNumber":86064,"originalJapaneseLine":"「仰る通りだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You speak the truth.\""},{"lineNumber":86065,"originalJapaneseLine":"「妖怪共は頭が二つに増えて迷ってやがる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The youkai are confused now that there are two leaders.\""},{"lineNumber":86066,"originalJapaneseLine":"「両雄並び立たず。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Two heroes cannot stand side by side."},{"lineNumber":86067,"originalJapaneseLine":"　王は二人もいらない、どちらかは消えるべきだ」","translatedEnglishLine":" There can't be two kings; one must vanish.\""},{"lineNumber":86068,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……お前、何故俺と戦わない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Why don't you fight me?\""},{"lineNumber":86069,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方には王になる気はないという。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You say you have no intention of becoming king."},{"lineNumber":86070,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ならば戦う理由がない」","translatedEnglishLine":" So there's no reason to fight.\""},{"lineNumber":86071,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":86072,"originalJapaneseLine":"「けっ……相変わらずだな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph... You're the same as always...\""},{"lineNumber":86073,"originalJapaneseLine":"黒部の雰囲気が途端に弛緩した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurobe's tense atmosphere suddenly relaxed."},{"lineNumber":86074,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やれやれ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good grief."},{"lineNumber":86075,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぬかに釘たぁ、このことだ」","translatedEnglishLine":" It's like driving a nail into soft wood.\""},{"lineNumber":86076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「せっかく喧嘩できりゃあ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If we could have a fight,"},{"lineNumber":86077,"originalJapaneseLine":"　面白そうな相手だってのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":" you'd be an interesting opponent...\""},{"lineNumber":86078,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":86079,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうか、力を貸してくれまいか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please, won't you lend me your strength?\""},{"lineNumber":86080,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……政宗、お前にも色々と理由はあろうが」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Masamune, I'm sure you have your reasons,"},{"lineNumber":86081,"originalJapaneseLine":"「断る。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I refuse."},{"lineNumber":86082,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺はもう誰にも従う気はねえ」","translatedEnglishLine":" I have no intention of following anyone anymore.\""},{"lineNumber":86083,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうしても言うこと聞かせたいなら――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you absolutely want me to obey—\""},{"lineNumber":86084,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":86085,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":86086,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、初代妖怪王と言うから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, you say you're the first Youkai King,"},{"lineNumber":86087,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どんな奴かと思ったら……」","translatedEnglishLine":" so I wondered what kind of guy you'd be...\""},{"lineNumber":86088,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前だな、飼い主恋しさに","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're just a foolish dog pining for your master,"},{"lineNumber":86089,"originalJapaneseLine":"　拗ねてる馬鹿犬ってのは」","translatedEnglishLine":" sulking like an idiot dog.\""},{"lineNumber":86090,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アアン？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aaan?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺はもう妖怪王になる気は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I already said I don't intend to become the Youkai King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またのこのことやってくるたぁ……」
「噛み殺されてぇかぁぁああ！！！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You want to be bitten to death?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空気をビリビリと震わせる咆哮が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A roar that made the air crackle and tremble,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 音の塊となってランス達に叩きつけられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: became a solid mass of sound and crashed into Rance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺まで格好悪く見られるだろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you faint, I'll look bad too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「黒部殿、貴方がそう言うなら、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then I no longer intend to have you reign

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君臨してもらおうとは思っていない」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Right now, the youkai are split between you and me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪なんだ、好きに生きりゃあいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're youkai after all, they should live as they please."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在JAPANは未曾有の危機にある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, JAPAN is facing an unprecedented crisis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は妖怪も人間と手を取り合わねば手遅れになる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now the youkai must also join hands with humans or it will be too late."
The whereabouts of the Youkai King!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺に勝手についてきやがった連中よ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are the ones who came following me on their own!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テメェが男を見せりゃあいい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then you show you're a man!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「妖怪共は頭が二つに増えて迷ってやがる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The youkai are confused now that there are two leaders."
"Two heroes cannot stand side by side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王は二人もいらない、どちらかは消えるべきだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There can't be two kings; one must vanish."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方には王になる気はないという。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You say you have no intention of becoming king.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ならば戦う理由がない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So there's no reason to fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部の雰囲気が途端に弛緩した。
ぬかに釘たぁ、このことだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's like driving a nail into soft wood."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 面白そうな相手だってのに……」
「どうか、力を貸してくれまいか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please, won't you lend me your strength?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……政宗、お前にも色々と理由はあろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Masamune, I'm sure you have your reasons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はもう誰にも従う気はねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have no intention of following anyone anymore."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうしても言うこと聞かせたいなら――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you absolutely want me to obey—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、初代妖怪王と言うから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, you say you're the first Youkai King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんな奴かと思ったら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I wondered what kind of guy you'd be..."
"You're just a foolish dog pining for your master,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 拗ねてる馬鹿犬ってのは」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I already said I don't intend to become the Youkai King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またのこのことやってくるたぁ……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A roar that made the air crackle and tremble,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 音の塊となってランス達に叩きつけられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: became a solid mass of sound and crashed into Rance and the others.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then I no longer intend to have you reign

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君臨してもらおうとは思っていない」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Right now, the youkai are split between you and me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪なんだ、好きに生きりゃあいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're youkai after all, they should live as they please."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, JAPAN is facing an unprecedented crisis.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now the youkai must also join hands with humans or it will be too late."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are the ones who came following me on their own!"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then you show you're a man!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王は二人もいらない、どちらかは消えるべきだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There can't be two kings; one must vanish."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You say you have no intention of becoming king.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So there's no reason to fight."

ぬかに釘たぁ、このことだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's like driving a nail into soft wood."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please, won't you lend me your strength?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……政宗、お前にも色々と理由はあろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Masamune, I'm sure you have your reasons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はもう誰にも従う気はねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have no intention of following anyone anymore."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうしても言うこと聞かせたいなら――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you absolutely want me to obey—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、初代妖怪王と言うから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, you say you're the first Youkai King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんな奴かと思ったら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I wondered what kind of guy you'd be..."
"You're just a foolish dog pining for your master,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 拗ねてる馬鹿犬ってのは」
